about_the_game:
Show off your rhythm in a musical battle where the music decides your fate! Face the God of Time and capture souls to the beat of the music to survive.

🎵 UNIQUE RHYTHM MECHANICS

Each soul is a note falling on one of the 7 strings of your board. To capture them, you must press buttons with both hands as if you were playing real musical chords.

  • Left Hand: Selects the range of strings where you can capture souls.

  • Right Hand: Chooses the exact string within the selected range and plays at the right moment.

  • Double Challenge: Simultaneous notes and strategic combinations will put your skills to the test.

⚔️ USE MUSIC TO ATTACK

You can’t attack your enemy directly… but you can make them drop their guard!
Capture notes in succession to build up your Hype Combo, and once you reach the max level, unleash a devastating attack.

  • Master the rhythm to break defenses and overcome obstacles.

  • Prepare for epic boss fights with unique patterns and surprising mechanics.

🎸 INCREASING MUSICAL CHALLENGES

As you progress, chord combinations will become more complex, and you will face powerful bosses with unique and challenging mechanics. Can you overcome them?

🎶 CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE

  • Adjust the note speed to match your playstyle.

  • Play as the mysterious protagonist with no memory, or choose between Bezto, the wise and friendly frog, and Arellys, a fierce fighter with a mighty hammer.

Immerse yourself in this rhythmic experience and prove you have what it takes to conquer the music and save your soul!
